title: taTa taTavena
sahitya:
taTa taTavena rudra caNDi tANDavam purindAL Uzhi-tANDavam purindAL


anupallavi

  kaTa kaTavena kAr puyaliDa kalandu shuTra minnal veTTat-


caraNam    shaDa shaDavenat-taga tagavena shuDargaL vIzhavE
paTa paTavena Uzhi neruppin pATTu vIravE
maDa maDavenap-pazhaiya koDumai maDindu pOghavE
iDi iDiyena iratta sirippAl iruL naDunga ighal oDungavE
